name: ismartgate
0:
”Alexa, open garage door”
”Alexa, close garage door”
”Alexa, what is the status of garage door?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ismartgate is the best Smart Garage Door Opener for your home that will remotely open, close and control your garage door or gate through Amazon Alexa, Apple HomeKit, Google Home, Samsung SmartThings and iFTTT (all for Free, No fees). 
Includes key features such as Video Recording & Monitoring, Remote Access, User management and Calendar of events, Real time alerts, Control 3 gates with 1 device, LED light, Compatibility with all garage and gates, Easy to install, Multiplatform, etc… Discover more at! https://www.ismartgate.com/

Secure and Privacy:
ismartgate has a unique technological architecture that puts your privacy before the commercial use of your data. In other words, nobody but you can access to the list of users, admin settings, log of events or daily history.

Get your Smart Garage today!
To use ismartgate from an Amazon Alexa, you must purchase and install an ismartgate. Buy your ismargate at https://shop.ismartgate.com/ or from Amazon. Once you have installed your ismartgate, you can then link it to your Amazon Alexa.

Features of this Skill:
You will be able to open and close your garage door connected to the ismartgate and also, ask to Alexa for the status of the garage door.

Linking requirements:
You will need the UDI of your ismartgate, the user name and the password. The UDI can be found under Settings -> Device in the ismartgate access app. You can use the username "admin" or any other user created on the device.
